title: The Indrani Raani Haar: Emerald & Polki Pendant Necklace
materials: Seed Pearls. Gold is finished with a traditional Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster.
features: This exquisite pendant necklace showcases a floral motif pendant, with each petal delicately enameled in vibrant green. The central Polki diamonds, set in a Kundan style, create a striking contrast. A cascading tassel of emerald and ruby beads, finished with tiny seed pearls, adds a touch of whimsy and elegance. The chain features spaced Emerald and ruby beads, accentuating the pendant beautifully.
occasions: and upscale social gatherings. Also suitable for gifting during Seemantham ceremonies.
description: This Indrani Raani Haar embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry craftsmanship. The use of natural Polki diamonds and vibrant Emeralds & Rubies makes it a true statement piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine, making it a valuable heirloom. Its unique floral design and color combination capture a blend of traditional elegance and modern sensibilities.
